languages.text: {n}Офицер сжимается под вашим взглядом.{/n} "Чернь, посмевшая поднять руку на законную власть... умоляю, Ваша Светлость, позвольте сопроводить вас в поместье, где госпожа губернатор все вам объяснит!"

{n}The officer cowers under your gaze.{/n} "They are rabble who dare to raise their hand against the planet's lawful authority... I beg you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, allow me to escort you inside. The governor will explain everything to you!"
languages.original_text: {n}Офицер сжимается под вашим взглядом.{/n} "Чернь, посмевшая поднять руку на законную власть... умоляю, Ваша Светлость, позвольте сопроводить вас в поместье, где госпожа губернатор все вам объяснит!"

traits.locale_text: {n}The officer cowers under your gaze.{/n} "They are rabble who dare to raise their hand against the planet's lawful authority... I beg you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, allow me to escort you inside. The governor will explain everything to you!"

{n}The officer cowers under your gaze.{/n} "They are rabble who dare to raise their hand against the planet's lawful authority... I beg you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, allow me to escort you inside. The governor will explain everything to you!"

{n}The officer cowers under your gaze.{/n} "They are rabble who dare to raise their hand against the planet's lawful authority... I beg you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, allow me to escort you inside. The governor will explain everything to you!"

{n}The officer cowers under your gaze.{/n} "They are rabble who dare to raise their hand against the planet's lawful authority... I beg you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, allow me to escort you inside. The governor will explain everything to you!"

languages.text: {n}El oficial se encoge ante tu mirada.{/n} «Escoria que osa levantar la mano contra la legítima autoridad del planeta... Se lo ruego, mil{mf|ord|ady}, permítame que le escolte al interior. ¡La gobernadora se lo explicará todo!».
languages.original_text: {n}The officer cowers under your gaze.{/n} "They are rabble who dare to raise their hand against the planet's lawful authority... I beg you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, allow me to escort you inside. The governor will explain everything to you!"

traits.locale_text: {n}El oficial se encoge ante tu mirada.{/n} «Escoria que osa levantar la mano contra la legítima autoridad del planeta... Se lo ruego, mil{mf|ord|ady}, permítame que le escolte al interior. ¡La gobernadora se lo explicará todo!».

languages.text: {n}这位官员被你盯得战战兢兢。{/n}“他们是一群暴民，打算反对这颗行星的合法政权……我请求您，{mf|大人|大人}，请允许我护送您去总督那里吧。总督会把一切事情都向您解释清楚！”
languages.original_text: {n}The officer cowers under your gaze.{/n} "They are rabble who dare to raise their hand against the planet's lawful authority... I beg you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, allow me to escort you inside. The governor will explain everything to you!"

traits.locale_text: {n}这位官员被你盯得战战兢兢。{/n}“他们是一群暴民，打算反对这颗行星的合法政权……我请求您，{mf|大人|大人}，请允许我护送您去总督那里吧。总督会把一切事情都向您解释清楚！”

languages.text: {n}あなたに睨まれて将校は縮こまる。{/n}「恐れ多くも、法に基づくこの星の支配に反抗する暴徒です…申し訳ありません、陛下、屋敷内での護衛をさせていただきます。すべては総督がお話しいたします！」
languages.original_text: {n}The officer cowers under your gaze.{/n} "They are rabble who dare to raise their hand against the planet's lawful authority... I beg you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, allow me to escort you inside. The governor will explain everything to you!"

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたに睨まれて将校は縮こまる。{/n}「恐れ多くも、法に基づくこの星の支配に反抗する暴徒です…申し訳ありません、陛下、屋敷内での護衛をさせていただきます。すべては総督がお話しいたします！」

languages.text: {n}Der Offizier senkt angesichts deines Blicks den Kopf.{/n} "Sie sind Gesindel, das es wagt, seine Hand gegen die rechtmäßige Autorität des Planeten zu erhaben ... Ich flehe Euch an, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, erlaubt mir, Euch hinein zu begleiten. Die Gouverneurin wird euch alles erklären!"
languages.original_text: {n}The officer cowers under your gaze.{/n} "They are rabble who dare to raise their hand against the planet's lawful authority... I beg you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, allow me to escort you inside. The governor will explain everything to you!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Offizier senkt angesichts deines Blicks den Kopf.{/n} "Sie sind Gesindel, das es wagt, seine Hand gegen die rechtmäßige Autorität des Planeten zu erhaben ... Ich flehe Euch an, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, erlaubt mir, Euch hinein zu begleiten. Die Gouverneurin wird euch alles erklären!"

languages.text: {n}L'officier se recroqueville sous le poids de votre regard.{/n} « Ce ne sont que des racailles qui osent se révolter contre l'autorité légitime de cette planète... Je vous en prie, Votre Seigneurie, permettez-moi de vous accompagner à l'intérieur. La gouverneure vous expliquera tout ! »
languages.original_text: {n}The officer cowers under your gaze.{/n} "They are rabble who dare to raise their hand against the planet's lawful authority... I beg you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, allow me to escort you inside. The governor will explain everything to you!"

traits.locale_text: {n}L'officier se recroqueville sous le poids de votre regard.{/n} « Ce ne sont que des racailles qui osent se révolter contre l'autorité légitime de cette planète... Je vous en prie, Votre Seigneurie, permettez-moi de vous accompagner à l'intérieur. La gouverneure vous expliquera tout ! »

languages.text: {n}Subay, bakışlarının altında eziliyor.{/n} "Bunlar, gezegenin meşru otoritesine karşı el kaldırmaya cüret eden ayaktakımı. Yalvarırım {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, izin verin size içeriye kadar eşlik edeyim. Valimiz her şeyi açıklayacaktır!"
languages.original_text: {n}The officer cowers under your gaze.{/n} "They are rabble who dare to raise their hand against the planet's lawful authority... I beg you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, allow me to escort you inside. The governor will explain everything to you!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Subay, bakışlarının altında eziliyor.{/n} "Bunlar, gezegenin meşru otoritesine karşı el kaldırmaya cüret eden ayaktakımı. Size yalvarıyorum {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, izin verin size içeriye kadar eşlik edeyim. Vali her şeyi açıklayacaktır!"
